Name: EXIT 2
About the game: EXIT 2 Is an short horror game in which you have to collect items without getting caught by the creatures. In order to win a level, you have to collect all items. but there is a creature looking for you. Gameplay is fast and can be sometimes difficult. Features 10 Levels 3 Enemys Achievements Modding Support
Meta Title: EXIT 2: Dec 7, 2021, Enreeper and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on EXIT 2? Check out the release date (Dec 7, 2021), developer insights from Enreeper, and a complete game summary.
